summary: A pytest test suite exercising the core library component, covering creation and manipulation of tags and entries, file addition, alias handling, preference settings, search operations (by path, tag, filetype, mediatype), field ordering and removal, and hierarchical parent relationships.
business_intent: Validate the functionality and reliability of the media library system, ensuring that tagging, entry management, search capabilities, and user preferences work correctly for downstream applications that organize and retrieve digital assets.
